channel.title: ...@yourdomain.whatever + some other questions
channel.description:
hi i just would like to know how i can get emails like example@moparisthebest.com or what ever your site is also i would like to know is it possible to just use one picture as a background and then just lay text over it so it looks like you have got a lot less coding to do e.g. if you went to www.runescape.com and looked at the site you have a lot of little pictures could you just make them into one picture and all the text that will never change just make it it into a picture and put it as the sites background to save you a lot of coding or is this a newbi way of doing it?
p.s i just made this simple site (just for me) as my home page just with my best sites is there away of putting something in the middle because ive got a table on the side i cant put text next to it in my case the middle or something i would also like to know is can i get a Java plug in to run my server there (just the playing screen) so it will play my server. p.s my site is http://imbored.freehostia.com/Switch.html (just a test domane until i get good at web desinge)
~thanks n00b1

item.title: ...@yourdomain.whatever + some other questions
item.dc:creator: @Kimber Kimber
item.description:
@Kimber wrote:

Hmm its your personal homepage so its your choice wether you want something in the middle or not… If you want to know how to put something in the middle then just whack an iframe and position it to the middle of the page and put what you want in there. When I create sites sometimes I use photoshop for the main layout, just create the image in photoshop, use the slice tool for any links and then save for web and make each slice a link.

Read full topic

item.title: ...@yourdomain.whatever + some other questions
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

you would make the image to the background image in html.
And you need a domain to get blah@mysite.com that offers e-mailing. EG: Yahoo lets you have one yahoo mail account forwarded to a regular yahoo email.

Or you can go to emails or whatever in your hosters cpanel and it will show you.

Read full topic
